meanings.definition: Fidos (noun): A brand of dog food.
meanings.sent1: I bought some fidos for my pet dog.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various brands of dog food, including fidos.
meanings.sent3: My dog seems to prefer fidos over other dog food brands.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of fidos filled the room, making all the dogs excited.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of fidos caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: Fidos (adjective): Loyal and faithful, like a dog.
meanings.sent1: She is a fidos friend who always supports me.
meanings.sent2: Dogs are known for their fidos nature towards their owners.
meanings.sent3: His fidos behavior towards his family is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood in the yard, a fidos guardian of the house.
meanings.sent5: The fidos dog stayed by his side through thick and thin.

meanings.definition: Fidos (verb): To trust or rely on someone or something completely.
meanings.sent1: I fidos my best friend with all my secrets.
meanings.sent2: In times of need, we often fidos our family for support.
meanings.sent3: I fidos my lucky charm to bring me good fortune.
meanings.sent4: She decided to fidos her instincts and take the leap of faith.
meanings.sent5: The captain had to fidos his crew to navigate through the storm.
